mapper.insert: INSERT INTO library( library_id, library_pw, local_no) VALUES( #{libraryId}, #{libraryPw}, #{localNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT local_no as localNo, local_name as localName FROM LOCAL ORDER BY local_no ASC
SELECT local_no as localNo, library.library_id as libraryId, local.local_name as localName FROM library INNER JOIN local ON library.local_no = local.local_no
